rules: Do not use Unstable_Grid2 due to known layout and style conflicts.
All record tables must have a church_id foreign key.
User accounts should be stored in orthodoxmetrics_db; the church database is only for record holding.
Frontend build requires --legacy-peer-deps flag for npm install.
Frontend build requires NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" environment variable for npm run build.
The project environment is Linux; do not use PowerShell commands, use Linux shell commands instead.
User prefers to manually stop and start the server themselves and does not need the assistant to handle server restarts.
User prefers that when fixing frontend build issues, the assistant should just tell them to rebuild the frontend instead of providing detailed steps.

components.LoginPage.tsx: Handles user session with JWT + cookie-based auth.
components.RecordPreviewPane.tsx: Displays styled record form preview in real time.
components.OMBigBook.tsx: File management system for OrthodoxMetrics documentation and code files.
components.Router.tsx: Main routing configuration with protected routes and lazy loading.

database.orthodoxmetrics_db: Main application database for users and system data
database.church_db: Database for record holding only, not for user storage
